channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-26329|2024-08-03T05:03:32.373Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20identity%20manager
item.description: File existence disclosure vulnerability in NetIQ Identity Manager plugin prior to version 4.8.5 allows attacker to determine whether a file exists on the filesystem. This issue affects: Micro Focus NetIQ Identity Manager NetIQ Identity Manager versions prior to 4.8.5 on ALL.

item.title: CVE-2022-26330|2024-08-03T05:03:31.777Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20arcsight%20logger
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in Micro Focus ArcSight Logger. The vulnerabilities could be remotely exploited resulting in Information Disclosure, or Self Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). This issue affects: Micro Focus ArcSight Logger versions prior to v7.2.2 version and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2022-26325|2024-08-03T05:03:32.196Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20access%20manager
item.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in NetIQ Access Manager prior to 5.0.2

item.title: CVE-2022-26326|2024-08-03T05:03:32.393Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20access%20manager
item.description: Potential open redirection vulnerability when URL is crafted in specific format in NetIQ Access Manager prior to 5.0.2

item.title: CVE-2022-26331|2024-08-03T05:03:32.278Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20arcsight%20logger
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in Micro Focus ArcSight Logger. The vulnerabilities could be remotely exploited resulting in Information Disclosure, or Self Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). This issue affects: Micro Focus ArcSight Logger versions prior to v7.2.2 version and prior versions.
